learningpod.title: Common Core ELA: Vocabulary Acquisition and Use (Context Clues)

questionBody.p: The word compound has more than one meaning.
Choose the sentence in which compound means "to add to or increase something."

simpleChoice.p: Water is an unusual compound because it expands when it changes from liquid to solid.
Spending more money will just compound the debt you already have.
The military compound had heavy security gates and was guarded by soldiers.
Compound sentences are joined with a conjunction.
